item.description:
Introduction to Transition Towns

Alastair and Pat Proulx-Lough will present an introduction to the Transition Town concept , including:

How it allows people to tackle the challenges
of Peak Oil and Climate Change within their
community

How it relates to existing green efforts, and

How it also addresses the inner world,
where change begins.

A short video of Rob Hopkins presentation to the International Forum on Globalization in 2007 will be shown. The progress of the several Transition Towns in the UK and US will be presented. A general discussion will follow, looking at the frame of mind in Portland and Maine in general, and how the process might proceed in the greater Portland area, and other areas in Maine.
